data.text: we have seen the evolution of Facial Recognition in the past 5 years. We launched the first ever smart doorbell with facial recognition, Chui, back in 2013. Creating custom hardware and interacting with our customers daily helped us carve the path to TrueFace.Ai. We learned the importance of security, privacy and convenience and built our solution to address these concerns and provide the best experience possible. In 2016 we launched a commercial access control product but quickly saw an opportunity to strip out our accumulated industry knowledge and to use it across a variety of different industries. Our mission is to educate people on the benefits of this technology and make it accessible for anyone looking for more personalized and secure solutions.
